channel.title: Random connection loses
channel.description:
From several different servers now, all i've been doing is leveling combat when suddenly i lose connection from Mopar (not my internet connection) i'm playing in servers that are 100% and am new to mopar so if there is a thread that explains why i am getting problem please refer it to me otherwise could anyone solve my problem?
Thanks :)

item.title: Random connection loses
item.dc:creator: @x_brute_x x brute x
item.description:
@x_brute_x wrote:

Thanks guys, appreciate it

Read full topic

item.title: Random connection loses
item.dc:creator: @Paradise_God Paradise God
item.description:
@Paradise_God wrote:

[quote=“x brute x, post:1, topic:70137”]From several different servers now, all i’ve been doing is leveling combat when suddenly i lose connection from Mopar (not my internet connection) i’m playing in servers that are 100% and am new to mopar so if there is a thread that explains why i am getting problem please refer it to me otherwise could anyone solve my problem?

Thanks :)[/quote]
This is the 100% answer to your question…
The server hasan auto restarter, which restarts the server without anybody’s intention.
Most probably, it will restart every 30 minutes.

If this is not the answer, and you can not log in to the server, after getting dis-connected from he server, I’m sorry, I can’t help any further.

Read full topic

item.title: Random connection loses
item.dc:creator: @breaking_the_bridge breaking the bridge
item.description:
@breaking_the_bridge wrote:

Either of the following is happening to cause this problem

[ul][li]Server Has Just Shut Down For Updates[/li]
[li]You Were Clicking To Fast Which Casued The Server To Go Overdrive So It Kicked You Off[/li]
[li]You Don’t Have The Latest Java Which Can Be Found here[/li]
[li]The Server Completely Shut Down[/li][/ul]

~Glad To Help Anyone, Also If You Need Any More Help, Visit My Help Topic Which Can Be Found Here~

Read full topic

item.title: Random connection loses
item.dc:creator: @cccrrraaazzziii cccrrraaazzziii
item.description:
@cccrrraaazzziii wrote:

Yes, as x0 0wn said, either your fast clicking, or it could be a server restart.

Read full topic
